content: Stellar return from a stellar dev! Keep em coming! SOONER!
Great game. Better than the first.

Do I love this game? Yes. Am I a long time kairosoft fan? Yes. Am I drowning in pop ups and bath salts? SWEET MOTHER OF MR X YES!! Seriously the constant pop ups are too much! I'm so over having a pop up every time someone "finds" bathsalts.. I have nowhere to put them please just leave them where yu found it!! But yea seriously this is a 5 star game ruined by 5 pop ups every 20 seconds. Fix please! Also wish bath effects carried over through playthroughs like previous game.

So I've been enjoying this game quite a bit but I have run into what may be a bug. I built my baths in a separate building connected to the main building by an out door path. I have two verandas connected to the same stone path on two sides and something about that seems to have prevented my guests from going into the bath building, they will start to walk up the veranda then spontaneously turn back around and leave. But my staff doesn't have that issue so I'm a bit confused at whats wrong.
It was fun, but the second inn is the same. Also it isn't very clear how to make things more popular
Klassicly Kairosoft gameplay, but needs fleshing out; for example, too few special group tours where a group of three seperate NPCs needs catered to, making for some interesting balancing acts.
Wish the was different skintone for npcs and player
Not really enough new game play compared to the first one. Buy one or the other.

As a long time Kairosoft dabbler, I can attest to this being a great approachable entry. It has the same problems as most KS titles, mainly the repetitive nature becoming more apparent as you reach "end game", and that the game can pretty much manage itself NP - The difficulty is not high, and there isn't any one task that requires your attention lest you fail, ala Game Dev. Still addictive. TIP: its 100% easier to rearrange the spring if you move everything in a line 1st on the property edge!
The user interface is a bit glitchy and laggy for me but overall fun game

I've now started 5 different game files because as I progress farther I feel I have to rework my whole set up and I'm having tons of fun despite that issue. My only qualms really are the building system and no pause to rework massive amounts of stores and rooms which disrupt everything. Getting to lvl 40 and looking over the hellscape of thousands of pixels is intimidating. Also as mentioned elsewhere, touch is off on my Android phone and iPad pro. Maybe patch this issue? That would be great!

I love these games and the quality of life features are slowing getting better. There are many improvements that need to be made however. I love how you can adjust things now, but its still very difficult. I would like to be able to have a room inventory, like the scenery so i can rearrange my hot springs easily. Because you never know where to put things until you get much further in the game when its too late and difficult to move things around.
Classic, wonderful Kairosoft game ‚ô•Ô∏è
Back to the good old days of Kairosoft.

Great game, there's so much to it! I wish there weren't as many pop ups as I can't even for a facility without being interrupted. There's literally a pop up every 8 seconds or less (yes I counted) also there's a big that shows a characters first visit twice.
Same base game as HSS1 but better and more features.
A great reinventing of the "classic" game.
Cute games....

Just finished my first run to get a hook of it, and I really enjoyed it! The first game was a favourite, but this one took it to a new level! I am glad of all the new stuff and new options for designs/colour schemes of facilities. It really sucked out a lot of hours for me trying to redesign the resort over and over again because that.
Another great game from Kairosoft. No micro transaction üëç
Best game able to play until end game
Amazing. Will pay for all your games.
One of the best to come out recently

Yay new kairosoft game!!!!! So excited I bought it as soon as I seen it few days after it came out and I love it so much. It has lots of new stuff that the old hot springs game didn't have and the graphics are better too. All the characters pictures (like pumpkin) are so adorable! worth it!! Please make a dungeon village remake. Thats my favorite game :)
Love the new game! Although I'm dissapointed that Kairosoft just dissapeared for a while and we had to wait so long!

Awesome game, i play every game kairosoft brings out. just currently having a glitch where the app crashes after year 5, month 9 at 12pm after they announce my scores, so I've currently stopped playing, but hopefully this will be fixed in future updates so i can keep going
Classic Kairosoft with an updated UI, love it! Can't wait to see what new ones they release, hopefully a sequel to dungeon stories or game dev story üòÅ
Pretty good, an improvement over the original. It can still be difficult to move and place buildings.

Any old school Kairosoft fan will love this. It blows some other efforts of the past few years out of the water. For newcomers, this is the newest in a long line of fun and highly addictive management sims which are worth every penny.

This is the best Kairosoft game I've played yet - the first one where I've kept playing past the initial scoring period. I do wish there were fewer popups that require a tap to dismiss. Sometimes you want to just let the game run a few minutes to build up some cash, but you've gotta dismiss a popup every few seconds. It hasn't stopped me from spending an unreasonable amount of time on this game, though! LOVE LOVE LOVE that there are no micro-transactions!
Wow - it's really a worthy successor for the first hot springs. A full premium game, well balanced. Buy it!

I absolutely love how they returned back to their old style of games but with new gameplay to keep it fresh. It feels as natural, and as big of an improvement, as Mario 3 felt to Mario 1. More options out the gate for decorations and designs. Easier upgrade and expansion requirements. No microtransactions and a game play so addicting I recommend not playing it in bed.
A definite upgrade to one of Kairosoft's best management sims. Plenty of new systems and things to do. It's sad that I have to actually say this but thanks for not including micro transactions!
Quality üëåüëåüëèüëè

This a very good game! At last Kairosoft is back to it gory! No micro transaction!! Very good!! Improve a lot from prequel i love this game. THANK YOU Kairosft for deliver REAL GAME for us to enjoy i wish you able to do like this forever.
finaly a new kairosoft game i dont think i need to say anything more right?
Great sequel to a classic
Addictive game. Love this genre . I don't understand why they didn't allow you to carry forward the last game info over to the new game. That's why I gave it a 4 stars only
Great game!! So many improvement compare to 1st version of hot springs game.. but please make English version for the new release boxing game... Thank you for the game kairosoft

Another absorbing game by Kairosoft! I wasn't a huge fan of the first Hot Springs Story, but this is a smooth, beautiful, in-depth experience like I've come to expect from Kairosoft. (I'd love to see a sequel to Dream House Days next!)
Old time classic with an extra improvement!
Oh my goodness Thankyou!!! I've been waiting so long for this!!! and it's not free to play and omg you have made myself and I know alot of other people so happy :)
Love it! A Hot Spring Story game with updated features of the original. Lots more to do! Thank you Kairosoft! Please keep them coming!
It's been 84 years, and Kairosoft has finally released a new game. LETS GOOOOOOOO.
Supports both landscape and portrait mode on the s10. Been waiting for this game for ages!
the landscape mode cannot apply. i cant play it on my android gmaing device as only landscape mode is supported. i was looking forward to this game,such a pity.
